full_text: IMPORTANT MESSAGE FOR: OF: DATE: TIME: A.M. P.M. additional_notes: The document appears to be a scan of a notepad containing four 'Important Message' forms. The forms contain handwritten notes with phone messages and contact information. The document is dated 07/26/17 and has a Public Records Request No.: 17-295.
